metadata.description: George Palmer appears to be a mild-mannered, unassuming man, but beneath the placid exterior seethe violent emotions and disturbing childhood memories. When new tenants move into George's building, he begins to feel old, familiar urges and becomes aware of a nagging scent-a strange, pervasive smell that's making everything in George's world seem…tainted.
metadata.name: Vertigo Voices: Tainted
